p: GAG content of the culture supernatant of MSC, cMSC and AC groups was performed using Blyscan glycosaminoglycan assay kit (Biocolor Ltd, Co Antrim, UK). Briefly, the aliquot of each sample was mixed with DMMB dye and reagents (Biocolor) according to the manufacturer's instructions. The absorbance was measured at 656 nm using nanophotometer (Implen, München, Germany). Values from GAG analysis were normalized to the protein content (ng GAG/μg protein).
